title: Context-Based Ecosystem Project: Mathematical Approaches for Biodiversity and Environmental Problem Solving (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ecology concepts and high school-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: A course integrating theory and practice through modeling and simulation activities using real-world environmental data.

learning_goals: Learners can represent and analyze interactions between biological species within ecosystems using mathematical models
Learners can design and evaluate biodiversity indicators for solving region-specific environmental issues
Learners can predict ecosystem change trends and propose alternatives using data visualization tools

resources: Ecological Data Analysis Software (e.g., R, Python Libraries)
Environmental Simulation Virtual Lab Platform for Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
